statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: Bryan Antoine converts four-point play with 1.5 seconds left to give Radford a win over Marshall
article.description: — Bryan Antoine converted a four-point play with 1.5 seconds left to give Radford a 66-62 victory over Marshall on Friday night at The Greenbrier.
article.linkText: Bryan Antoine converts four-point play with 1.5 seconds left to give Radford a win over Marshall
article.story: WHITE SULPHUR SPRINGS, W.Va. -- — Bryan Antoine converted a four-point play with 1.5 seconds left to give Radford a 66-62 victory over Marshall on Friday night at The Greenbrier. Antoine came around a pair of screens and found himself open in the corner for a 3-pointer. He was fouled on the play and made the free throw. Kenyon Giles scored a team-high 22 points for the Highlanders (1-1). Chandler Turner scored 13 points while shooting 5 for 8, including 3 for 4 from beyond the arc, and added 10 rebounds. DaQuan Smith was 4 of 14 shooting (3 for 9 from 3-point range) to finish with 12 points. Kamdyn Curfman finished with 18 points and four assists for the Thundering Herd (1-1). Nate Martin added 16 points, 11 rebounds and four blocks for Marshall. Obinna Anochili-Killen also had 12 points. NEXT UP Radford's next game is Sunday against Eastern Mennonite at home. Marshall plays Utah State on Sunday. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
